svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

source="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="355" y="180" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-9" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">withdraw</font>&nbsp; &nbsp;function&nbsp; called" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="275" y="120" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-10" target="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-10" value="<span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; text-align: start; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);">require(balances[msg.sender] &gt;= _amount, "Insufficient balance");<br></span><div style="text-align: start;"><font face="Source Code Pro, Consolas, Ubuntu Mono, Menlo, DejaVu Sans Mono, monospace, monospace"><span style="font-size: 14px; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);"> <font style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">passed，excuted</font></span></font></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="180" width="510" height="35" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-14" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-12" target="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-16"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="355" y="380" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-12" value="<div style="text-align: start;"><span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);">(bool success, ) = msg.sender.call{value: _amount}("");</span><font face="Source Code Pro, Consolas, Ubuntu Mono, Menlo, DejaVu Sans Mono, monospace, monospace"><span style="font-size: 14px; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);"><font style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);"></font></span></font></div><div style="text-align: start;"><span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);">	 <font style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">excuted，</font><font style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">dangerous</font></span></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="132.5" y="253.75" width="445" height="46.25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-15" value="step2" value="AttackerContract" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="295" y="330" width="120" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-20" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-18" target="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-18" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">fallback</font>&nbsp; function&nbsp;called" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="430" width="150" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-25" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-19" target="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="790" y="530" /> <mxPoint x="790" y="198" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-19" value="<span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; text-align: start; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);">if (address(target).balance &gt;= 1 ether) </span><div><span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; text-align: start; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);">{target.<font style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">withdraw</font>(1 ether);}</span></div><div><span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; text-align: start; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);"><font style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">passed</font></span></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="500" width="310" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-26" value="inifinite loop<div>when address(target) has balance</div><div>will extract funds from contract itself until eth drainout</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="370" width="310" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-32" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-19"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="355" y="680" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="390" y="600" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-34" value="the setp will never reach until loop end<div>and it will excute multiple times.</div><div>with potential&nbsp;Integer Underflow problem</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="355" y="585" width="240" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-36" value="<span style="font-family: &quot;Source Code Pro&quot;, Consolas, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, Menlo, &quot;DejaVu Sans Mono&quot;, monospace, monospace; font-size: 14px; text-align: start; white-space: pre; background-color: rgb(246, 247, 246);"> require(success, "Transfer failed");<br/><br/> balances[msg.sender] -= _amount;</span>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="185" y="680" width="340" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-37" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">didn't update the balance record</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="500" width="190" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LW5pX-4__23PgAAgI-9k-38" value="solidity ^0.6.0" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="305" y="10" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
inifinite loop
when address(target) has balance
will extract funds from contract itself until eth drainout

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 605px; margin-left: 443px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
the setp will never reach until loop end
and it will excute multiple times.
with potential Integer Underflow problem

switch.text: the setp will never reach until loop end...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
